column3: “This bud smells super fruity/tropical and kinda taste the same with green/dark green color, decked out and frozen in crystals. The experience is definitely indica high It works great an evening chill strain (got rid of a headache) and I could still be functional if required.”
“A nice, fruity indica to come home and relax to after a hard day of work. This flower didn't put me into the couch - I was still able to go about my evening plans.”
